This metric monitors 4xx error rate
This metric monitors 5xx error rate
This metric monitors cache hit ratio
This metric monitors CloudFront costs
This metric monitors daily data transfer
This metric monitors CloudFront 5xx error rate
This metric monitors origin response time
This metric monitors daily API costs (alerts if > $5/day)
This metric monitors AWS costs
This metric monitors Lambda function duration for dashboard-api
This metric monitors Lambda function errors for dashboard-api
This metric monitors Lambda function throttles for dashboard-api
This metric monitors Lambda invocations (high invocations = higher costs)
This metric monitors Lambda function errors for stats-refresher
This metric monitors LCP performance from AWS edge locations
This metric monitors TTFB performance from AWS edge locations
This metric monitors S3 costs
This metric monitors S3 5xx errors
This metric monitors staging site 4xx error rate
Alert when more than 5 untagged resources are detected
Alert when more than 10 unused resources are detected
This metric monitors blocked requests by WAF
This metric monitors rate limit rule triggers
This metric monitors daily WAF request volume
This metric monitors suspicious user agent blocks
